data.title: Add Wayland support
data.body:
As you might know there is a new protocol for a display server being developed for linux called Wayland. Currently godot does not support this as far as I know. As this is the future of the linux graphics stack I would very much like to see support for this.

This has no high priority because Wayland is far from production ready.

data.title: Add node2d::set_global_pos()
data.body: - Add set_global_pos api to node2d

data.title: Fixed DirAccessWindows::change_dir not working properly;
data.body:
- Fixed DirAccessWindows::change_dir not working properly;
- Minor code formating clean up

data.title: Make OS_Windows::get_data_dir return unix path
data.body: - to be consistent with other api, ( e.g. get_resource_path always return unix path )

data.title: Button "previous page" in Help kill editor sometimes
Invert Mouse option for editor 3d UI
data.body:
Request:  Invert Mouse option for editor 3d UI.

I would like there to be an option to invert the mouse when using ctrl+drag so that ctrl+mouseup = zoom out, ctrl+mousedown = zoom in.

data.title: Drag and Drop to reparent node in editor
data.body: Drag and drop [parenting] nodes in scene tab.

data.title: Fixed #553: Disable 3D nodes for smaller executable
data.body:
- Fix issue #553
- Please make sure following flags are added for successful build

disable_3d=yes module_gridmap_enabled=no tools=no

data.title: Adding travis ci support
data.body:
- Adding travis ci support, so future Pull Request will be validated against travis-ci build, before any drama happen on master branch
- Todo: add more platform build support (mac/win/ios/android)

data.title: Forgot to add SceneTreeDock::set_selected change in last PR
HTML5 build ignore mouse pos
data.body:
When I export this project (  https://mega.co.nz/#!yRgD3K6C!Iufz_NDf_sEFAUI4m0-x4T-joZhvfjWKUaBceOzik30 )) into this html5 build (( https://mega.co.nz/#!uZxxCAaB!n6CJo32dTwPfX9RrKzLlBvfXXUusVTtWWLGnQOQqLxo )) it seems that mouse  pos doesn't work (as well clicking object, even if mouse clicks are correctly processed)

Binary and export template used are the one currently available in the homepage ( June 19, 2014 (1.0devel) )

data.title: Fixed issue #429: in scene tab, clicking on some instance folder, change all the others views
data.body:
- Fix issue #429
- Script editor plugin try to restore state after sub-scene loaded, if there were scripts opened, will trigger loading resource and will make script tab visible. Solved it by select scene node after restoring plugins' state

data.title: Bug - WorldEnvironment didn't get cleaned up
data.body: http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1404131346.png

data.title: Fix ERROR: FileAccessWindows::_get_modified_time:  Method/Function Failed on windows
data.body: - Adding file exist check before trying to get resource modified time when editor gaining focus

data.title: Bug - Omni and Spot Light don't work correctly with 3D tiles
data.body:
How to recreate: add omni or spot light to 3D platformer demo and shade some tiles with it.
Affected by omni/spot light tiles become dark and are shaded only by it ignoring main Directional Light.

data.title: Bug - Textured/Cubemapped Sky breaks with more lights than one directional.
data.body:
How to recreate: add Environment Light to scene, set sky as Cube map or texture, add directional light, add any other light, move view camera a bit.
In my scene sky turned white and some 3D helpers lines were duplicated while I moved camera, in 3D platformer demo only 3D helpers were copied.

Image:
http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1404071922.png

data.title: Shadow map garbage shadow outside of directional light Max Distance
data.body:
I have quite big map and I need player to see quite far away.
So I made set-up with really big Camera Max distance view, and made my directional light Max Distance much smaller but enough to display RT shadows close to Camera, with reasonable sized shadow map.
Unfortunately in distance outside of Light Max Distance where should be no shadows, for some reason weird huge shadow is created.

Image:
![](http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1404070369.png)

data.title: FEATURE REQUEST- opening browser and other apps from inside of the game
data.body:
Hello,
       I want to open playstore from inside the game. but there seems no way to open browser or any app  from inside the game. plz add this feature. It would be better if we have something like OS.openURL()

data.title: Bug - Editor Settings - FOV and Z Far for 3D Editor camera not working
data.body: Fov, Z Far and I think Z Near in Editor Settings for 3D Editor are not working.

data.title: Bug - Broken Fog post-process
data.body:
Fog post-process works incorrectly.
Reduz said that it is written in vertex shader but should be in fragment.

data.title: include is_hovered() for TextureButton
Fix 3d platformer demo texture display black on android devices
data.body: - For some mystery reason, texture file of 3d platformer demo is broken on android devices (maybe ios too). Resave the texture solve the issue.

data.title: "Disable 3D nodes for smaller executable" doesn't compile
data.body:
Enabling this flag in SConstruct breaks compilation, showing errors such as:

".../scene/resources/world.cpp:206: undefined reference to VisibilityNotifier::_exit_camera(Camera*)'"

data.title: Add Xbox One Support
data.body: It would be cool if the game builds from Godot were compatible with Microsoft's consoles, it seems like a glaring omission among all of its other wonderful features.

data.title: tilemap friction/bounce
data.body: Tilemaps should allow the user to edit friction/bounce properties.

data.title: Bug - Scene Import - objects flipped by axis scaling not detected/fixed
data.body:
If you flip/mirror object by applying negative rescale on axis inside Blender, after importing it Godot doesn't detect that they are mirrored and shades them incorrectly. Additional weirdness is that mirroring one object affects some other as well, but this might be Blender hiccup.

Example .blend:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/31390469/bug%20bin/bolders_bug/blockout_kit_LP_rocks_boulders_001.blend

.dae:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/31390469/bug%20bin/bolders_bug/blockout_kit_LP_rocks_boulders_001.dae

.scn:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/31390469/bug%20bin/bolders_bug/blockout_kit_LP_rocks_boulders_001.scn

data.title: Fixed mouse motion events with captured mouse mode in OS X
mouse_mode implementation on OS X
in 2d panel, right click the mouse set to "pan mode"
data.body: I think this will be very convenient
